articles.author: Megan Thomas, CNN
articles.title: Melvin Van Peebles, trailblazing director and Black cinema champion, has died - CNN
articles.description: Melvin Van Peebles, a trailblazing African-American director who helped champion a new wave of modern Black cinema in the 1970s, has died, his son announced Wednesday. He was 89.
